description: Astilbe arendsii 'Augustlight' is a beautiful, long blooming perennial with its eye-catching magenta flowers and lush, green foliage. This showy deal is the perfect addition to any garden. During its peak season, Augustlight is full of ornamental, fluffy blooms. It will create a brilliant show of color in shaded or part-shaded places of your garden. Its low-care requirements and drought tolerance make it super easy to care for. Plus, the deer don't seem to get drawn to it, so you don't have to worry about it being eaten away. Augustlight is one of the best plants available in terms of beauty and easy care. It will give you a beautiful show of color throughout the summer season.
